TITLE: Basic Bar Chart Implementation DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to create a basic bar chart with ApexCharts including series data, categories and chart type configuration SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import ApexCharts from 'apexcharts' ``` LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var options = { chart: { type: 'bar' }, series: [ { name: 'sales', data: [30, 40, 35, 50, 49, 60, 70, 91, 125] } ], xaxis: { categories: [1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999] } } var chart = new ApexCharts(document.querySelector('#chart'), options) chart.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic ApexCharts Implementation DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing basic import ApexCharts from 'apexcharts' const options = { chart: { type: 'line' }, series: [ { name: 'sales', data: [30, 40, 45, 50, 49, 60, 70, 91, 125], }, ], xaxis: { categories: [1991, 1992, 1993, SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/samples/source/docs.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` #chart { max-width: 650px; margin: 35px auto; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Dependencies for ApexCharts.js DESCRIPTION: Command to install package dependencies using npm SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Development Build Command for ApexCharts.js DESCRIPTION: Command to build the library and watch source files for changes SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Local Server for Samples DESCRIPTION: Command to start a local server for viewing sample implementations SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx browser-sync start --server --files "." --directory --startPath "/samples" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SVG Resize Extension Declaration DESCRIPTION: Module declaration for svg.resize.js extension that enables resizing functionality for selected SVG elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/dist/apexcharts.amd.js.LICENSE.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` /*! * @svgdotjs/svg.select.js - An extension of svg.js which allows to select elements with mouse * @version 4.0.1 * https://github.com/svgdotjs/svg.select.js * * @copyright Ulrich-Matthias Sch√§fer * @license MIT * * BUILT: Mon Jul 01 2024 15:04:42 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time) */ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Git Commands for Contributing DESCRIPTION: Series of git commands for creating a feature branch and submitting changes SOURCE: https://github.com/apexcharts/apexcharts.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git checkout --branch feature/branch-name-here upstream/main git add -A git commit -m "Few words about the changes I did" git push --set-upstream origin feature/branch-name-here ```
